QuestData.Title: Castle Nathria: Getting a Head
QuestData.Description:
We need to show Denathrius that we mean business. His dredger... pet... should do the trick.
Bring me his head. Four times should do it. Dredgers are curious creatures.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Sludgefist's Head from Sludgefist within Castle Nathria on Normal Difficulty.
QuestData.RewardText: With these I'm certain we'll catch the attention of Sire Denathrius.
